name: Recall (itch) (Midnight Link Entertainment)
description:
You control Douglas, a man that has a past as a secret agent working for his country. Some day, his actions cause the death of his family. Now, living as a civilian and guilting himself for the death of his family, Doug finds Recall, a private memory implant agency to erase this mistake of his life. But now, he needs to revive every memory and make the right choices.

This game is a prototype, may contain bugs.

PC keybinds:

  • A/D - Movement
  • Space - Jump
  • Shift - Sprint
  • F - Interactions
  • Mouse - Aim
  • Left Mouse Click - Shoot
  • Right Mouse Click - Shield

Developers: Arthur Lorando, Gustavo Zanchetta, Raí Esteves, Reinaldo Di Pietro.
